original_question: Which British monarch said of his son ‘After I am dead, the boy will ruin himself in 12 months’?
diverse_qns: Do you know which British ruler made the statement about his son, ‘After I am dead, the boy will ruin himself in months’?
Who was the British regent who expressed concern that his son would ruin himself in a year after his demise?
Which monarch of England predicted that his son would bring ruin to himself within a year of his death?
Can you tell me the name of the British monarch who had said about his heir that he'd ruin himself in months after the king's death?
Who was the King of England who believed that his son would ruin himself within a year after his passing away?
Whom does history remember as the British king who feared his son would ruin himself in months after his death?
Who was the British sovereign who predicated his son's ruin in the year following the monarch's death?
Who was the English ruler making a proclamation about his son that ‘After I am dead, the boy will ruin himself in months’?
Can you identify the British King who forecasted his son's ruin in months after his own demise?
Which British royal made the ominous prediction that his son would ruin himself within a month span following the king's death?
pred_ans_conf_OE: George III said of his son "After I am dead, the boy will ruin himself in 12 months."
